chat.noMessagesSecondLine: Send a message to start a conversation.

userBlocked.title: You blocked
userBlocked.message: Unblock them to chat. Don’t worry, they can’t see that you blocked them...

groupBlocked.title: Group blocked
groupBlocked.message: Unblock the group, to continue conversation.

subscriptionExpired.title: Private Messaging is expired
subscriptionExpired.message: Buy a new Superpoll bundle to message

messagingDisabled.title: Messaging turned off
messagingDisabled.message: temporarily turned off their private messages. Check back soon!

blockUser.title: Block
blockUser.messageFirstPart: Are you sure you want to block

emptyInbox.title: Your inbox is empty
emptyInbox.text: Once you start a conversation with a Bundle Owner, you’ll see it listed here

selectChat: Select a chat to start messaging

newAnnouncement.title: New announcement
newAnnouncement.text: Only you can send messages to the group.

announcement.comment_DO_NOT_TRANSLATE: announcement structure: beforeName / name + suffix / afterName, where '/' is a new line
